descriptionHtml:
[youtube]XNJs4TMmrMM[/youtube]

[b]SKSE 1.6.16 or Higher Version.[/b]
http://skse.silverlock.org/



Maximum Drive V2.0
-Powers
-Auto learn

>Drive
-Shout(Z or RB(pad)) Button
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 25%
-Require Stamina : 12

>Maximum Bet
-Shout(Z or RB(pad)) Charge! 0.75 Sec
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 120%
-RequireStamina : 12*2

>Maximum Drive
-Shout(Z or RB(pad)) Charge! 2.00 Sec
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 120%
-RequireStamina : 12*2



*Health 40% > OverPower Drive
Over Drive
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 60%
Over Maximum Bet
Over Maximum Drive
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 180%

*Not enough Stamina > Weak Drive
Weak Drive
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 10%
Weak Maximum Bet
Weak Maximum Drive
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 30%




::Console Command::
If you want damage edit.
` > Set driveDamageRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)

If you want Require Stamina edit.
` > Set driveRequireStamina to 12.0
default value Stamina 12

If you want OverPower Drive Health Condition edit.
` > Set driveOverRate to 0.4
default value 0.4 (0.4 = Health 40%)




*Feel free to use everything in this file.





::Review::
[youtube]C704i_LYYJo[/youtube]
4:50
